<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Change label of benefit_plan_breakdown table to Monetary Benefit Plan Breakdown and
benefit_plan_breakdown_baseline table to Monetary Benefit Plan Breakdown Baseline</description>
        <name>Change BenefitPlanBrkdown/Baseline Label</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    gs.log("Update of benefit_plan_breakdown/baseline table labels - fix script execution started: " + new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue());

    updateTableLabel("benefit_plan_breakdown", "Monetary Benefit Plan Breakdown"); //Changing the label of Benefit Plan Breakdown table
    updateTableLabel("benefit_plan_breakdown_baseline", "Monetary Benefit Plan Breakdown Baseline"); //Changing the label of Benefit Plan Breakdown Baseline table

    function updateTableLabel(tableName, newLabel) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
        gr.addQuery('name', tableName);
        gr.addQuery('language', 'en');
        gr.addNullQuery('element');
        gr.query();
        if (gr.next()) {
            var tableNameEn = "sys_documentation_" + tableName + "_en";
            if (_isTableLabelCustomized(tableNameEn)) {
                gs.log("PPM: Skipping the label update of table " + tableName);
                return;
            }
            gr.setValue('label', newLabel);
            gr.setValue('plural', newLabel + 's');
            gr.update();
        } else {
            gs.log("PPM: skipping the update of table label as " + tableName + " table doesn't exist");
        }
    }
    gs.log("Update of benefit_plan_breakdown/baseline table labels - fix script execution completed : " + new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue());

    function _isTableLabelCustomized(tableNameEn) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_update_xml");
        gr.addQuery("name", tableNameEn);
        gr.addQuery("replace_on_upgrade", false);
        gr.query();
        if (gr.next())
            return true;
        return false;
    }

})();]]></script>
